text: @realDonaldTrump You took the #Coronavirus lightly and over 130,000 People have died. Over 3 million #Americans got it. You're on Twitter talking about Golf and still bringing up #BarackObama you're an idiot #TrumpIsNotWell #DonaldTrump #TrumpGolfsAmericansDie #WhitePrivilege #Trump #WhiteHouse
